about_the_game:
The best way to support the developer & creation of future games, the Fan Pack for SnowTunes Island! Featuring:

SnowTunes Island - Serenades for the Snow

The official soundtrack for SnowTunes Island! This includes 20 songs you've heard over your adventure. Listen to this to roll down memory lane!

SnowTunes Island - Radio Bonus

This bonus soundtrack features music from the SnowTunes Island beach-side radios. Revisit the past with classic songs from Space Crab 2, Notebook Jam, Neo Honeycomb Hop, and Virposa Odyssey! Additional song variants and jingles are also included in this album.

Music Project Files

Want to see how the music was created for the game? Included in the Fan Pack are the Sunvox project files for two in-game songs, Snowy Sunrise and Highlight the Clouds. Open them using the Sunvox audio software and see behind the scenes! (Sunvox software is not included; information about free Sunvox downloads can be found on the developer's website.)

To access these files once purchased, right-click on the game in your library, select 'Manage' -> 'Browse Local Files'. You will see the "SnowTunes Island - Fan Pack" folder, which contains the Fan Pack files.

name: SnowTunes Island - Fan Pack
short_description: The fan pack for SnowTunes Island, featuring the official soundtrack, the bonus soundtrack, and select project files!
